Request

# Investor Email Alerts

By providing your email address below, you are providing consent to Locafy to send you the requested Investor Email Alert updates.Please add **admin@investorpass.com** to your safe senders list to ensure these emails are not directed to your spam/junk folders. 

If you experience a problem unsubscribing or changing your subscriptions, please send an email to investor@locafy.com

![Woman typing on her laptop](/assets/images/email-alert.jpg)

Contact Information

# Contact Investor Relations

## Investor Relations Contact

Locafy's contact for investors, shareholders and analysts is:Tom Colton or Chris Adusei-Poku

Gateway Investor Relations

Phone: [+1 949-574-3860](tel:+19495743860)

Email: investor@locafy.com

## Shareholder Investor Services

Address written inquiries to:

Locafy Limited Investor Relations

246 Churchill AvenueSubiaco WA 6008Australia

**Transfer agent**

## Computershare Investor Services

Note: If you hold your shares through a broker, please contact your broker for assistance. The following information is applicable for registered holders. 

Locafy's transfer agent is Computershare. If you are a registered shareholder you may use Computershare's shareholder website, toll-free shareholder services center or automated telephone support system to access information and process transactions. Please note that you will need to supply your tax identification number and contact information, including address, when communicating with Computershare. 

You can manage your account online via the Investor Centre website, Computershare's secure Web-based tool for shareholders, at [www.computershare.com/investor](https://www.computershare.com/investor). Through free, around-the-clock access to the Investor Centre website, you can: 

  * View your account details and update account information 
  * Access tax forms 
  * Sell shares 
  * Research and obtain information related to transferring stocks 
  * Enroll in eDelivery to receive your shareholder materials electronically 



Contact Computershare to learn more about the services available using the options below:

Shareholder Website |  [www.computershare.com/investor](https://www.computershare.com/investor)  
---|---  
Shareholder online inquiries |  <https://www-us.computershare.com/investor/Contact>  
Telephone inquiries |  [1-800-736-3001, option 1 (US)](tel:+18007363001) [1-781-575-3100, option 1 (non-US)](tel:+17815753100)  
E-mail inquiries |  [web.queries@computershare.com](mail:web.queries@computershare.com)  
Written requests |  **Shareholder correspondence should be mailed to:** Computershare P.O. Box 505000 Louisville KY 40233-5000 **Overnight correspondence should be sent to:** Computershare 462 South 4th Street, Suite 1600 Louisville KY 40202  Please be sure to include your Investor Identification Number on all correspondence.   
  
### Sign Up For Investor Email Alerts

To stay informed on investor-specific updates, please sign up for our Investor Email Alerts and receive end of day share price reports, SEC Filings, and Press Releases directly to your inbox.

[ Go to Email Alerts ](/email-alerts)
